Hello, my name is

Andrew Wolson

I am a UX/UI Designer with a background in Print.

I have experience in Corporate design.

I worked for a corporation called EverBank for nearly 5 years. I started as a Graphic Designer and moved into a role as a UX Designer. I learned how a brand runs and operates. I saw how a re-brand works and how a creative organization opperates.

  • View Case Study

I contribute to the Design Community.

I am the AIGA Jacksonville web chair. I work with a telented team of designers. My role as web chair allows me to focus on the website.

  • View Case Study

I have experience creating small products.

I created a website about font information. Because I saw a gap in font resources for designers.

  • View Case Study

Rapport Building
 

I am a creative Green Beret.

I like to take on the Design challenges that others run from. I am the first one in and the last one out. Operating this way helps me to add value when problems occure. While I am an individual,I do not forget that a team creates somethingbetter as a whole. I support and build strong relatsionships with my co-workers.
